about_the_game:
Welcome to Grapple League.

You'll soon embark upon a high-flying swinging adventure through several different worlds and levels to prove your skill against others in the League. Will you be able to conquer the various levels, reach the mountaintop and go beyond? Prove yourself as a master grappler!

Features
Five different worlds!

  • Ocean World! Every grappler's first world. Colorful tarp covered objects create intense obstacle courses!
  • The Canyon! The windy canyon makes for winding tight passageways and wide areas for free swinging!
  • The Mountain! Exceptional difficulty renders most grapplers unable to complete the daunting task of traveling vast distances and ascending to the peak. Prove yourself!
  • Space! Gravity is no longer down! This may get tricky quick!
  • The City! A foggy grey cyberpunk city where the fastest and only way through is by swinging across flying cars!


Swing in Style Gain Style by swinging and grappling quickly! Manage to get up to S-Style and you'll find boost plentiful!

Build Boost by building Style! Boost charges dynamically based on your speed and style while you swing!

Unlockable Boost Types!
The initial boost is incredibly handy, but some say they have found other boost types with significant advantages!

  • Base Boost. Jet yourself in the direction your facing! A grappler's staple.
  • Jump. A direct leap upwards. Exceptionally useful in some situations!
  • Glide. More useful than it seems. Dampen momentum in all directions except the one you're facing!
  • Bounce. Difficult to master, but improbably handy. An isosphere that reflects anyone who impacts it perfectly. Also grappleable. Nice.
  • More? Rumor has it there was another, hidden and lost to space!

Endless Mode
Master all the courses available? Get some distance in this endless run where instead of time, distance is your foe.


The Ultimate Test
With Steam Leaderboards enabled test yourself against your friends and the best of the best. Think you're the greatest? Prove it!

Swing and fling yourself into the finish!

highlighted.name: Once you get the hang of it...
Use the boost to get through.
Something about a book and its cover.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Ryzen 2000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Grapple League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 2000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Utilize skill to swing yourself through multiple jaw-dropping levels in this time-trial, swinging, physics based platformer. From oceans to canyons to mountains and beyond take your swinging prowess across the world in obstacle filled levels. Swing into the finish. Set new records.
